title: Meta Pay is the new Facebook Pay as company chases identity and digital goods features
content:
A new blog post from Stephane Kasriel, Meta’s head of fintech, states that Facebook Pay is adopting the Meta branding. Soon to be Meta Pay – the refresh is working on enhancing the online payment experience.

more…

The post Meta Pay is the new Facebook Pay as company chases identity and digital goods features appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A new blog post from Stephane Kasriel, Meta's head of fintech, states that Facebook Pay is adopting the Meta branding.
